options.content:
# DSC Extended

These graphs presents more detailed statistics around RD/D0 bit, EDNS version, client port ranges etc,
that can be gathered by [DSC](https://www.dns-oarc.net/oarc/data/dsc).

**NOTE:** these graphs are just examples.

Read [this wiki article](https://codeberg.org/DNS-OARC/dsc-datatool/wiki/Setting-up-a-test-Grafana) how to set up this yourself.

targets.query: SELECT top("value", "tld", 10) FROM "qtype_vs_tld" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "tld" fill(0)

SELECT top("value", "clientaddr", "rcode", 20) FROM "client_addr_vs_rcode" WHERE "server" =~ /^$server$/ AND "node" =~ /^$node$/ AND "rcode" =~ /^$rcode$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "clientaddr", "rcode" fill(0)

SELECT top("value", "clientaddr", "rcode", 20) FROM "client_addr_vs_rcode" WHERE "server" =~ /^$server$/ AND "node" =~ /^$node$/ AND "rcode" =~ /^$rcode$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "clientaddr", "rcode" fill(0)

SELECT top("value", "clientaddr", "rcode", 20) FROM "client_addr_vs_rcode" WHERE "server" =~ /^$server$/ AND "node" =~ /^$node$/ AND "rcode" =~ /^$rcode$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "clientaddr", "rcode" fill(0)
